jcr:content.jcr:title: XS All Areas – The Greatest Hits

contentheadline.headline: XS All Areas – The Greatest Hits

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = XS All Areas - The Greatest Hits | Type = compilation | Artist = [[Status Quo (band)|Status Quo]] | Cover = | Released = | Recorded = | Genre = | Length = | Label = | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = | This album = | Next album = }} '''''XS All Areas – The Greatest Hits''''' is an album by English Rock band [[Status Quo (band)|Status Quo]]. It is a best-of compilation containing two discs. ==Track listing== ===Disc 1=== # [[Caroline (song)|Caroline]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Down Down]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Paper Plane (song)|Paper Plane]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) # Big Fat Mama ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Rick Parfitt]]) # [[Roll Over Lay Down]] ([[Francis Rossi]], [[Bob Young]], [[Rick Parfitt]], [[Alan Lancaster]] and [[John Coghlan (drummer)|John Coghlan]]) # Softer Ride ([[Rick Parfitt]] and [[Alan Lancaster]]) # Don't Waste My Time ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) # Little Lady ([[Rick Parfitt]]) # [[Mystery Song]] ([[Rick Parfitt]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Rain]] ([[Rick Parfitt]]) # [[Break the Rules]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Something 'Bout You Baby I Like]] ([[Richard Supa]]) # Hold You Back ([[Francis Rossi]], [[Rick Parfitt]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Rockin' All Over the World]] (Fogerty) # [[Whatever You Want]] ([[Rick Parfitt]] and [[Andy Bown]]) # [[Don't Drive My Car]] ([[Rick Parfitt]] and [[Andy Bown]]) # [[Again and Again (Status Quo song)|Again and Again]] ([[Rick Parfitt]], [[Andy Bown]]) and Lynton) # Forty Five Hundred Times ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Rick Parfitt]]) # [[All Stand Up]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) ===Disc 2=== # [[You'll Come 'Round]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Thinking of You (Status Quo song)|Thinking of You]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Jam Side Down]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Rick Parfitt]]) # Creepin Up On You ([[Rick Parfitt]] and [[John Edwards (musician)|John "Rhino" Edwards]]) # [[Down the Dustpipe]] ([[Carl Groszman]]) # [[Pictures of Matchstick Men]] [[Francis Rossi]] # [[Ice in the Sun]] ([[Marty Wilde]] and [[Ronnie Scott]]) # [[In My Chair]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Gerdundula]] [[Francis Rossi]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Wild Side of Life]] (Arlie Carter and William Warren) # [[Rock 'N' Roll]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and Bernie Frost) # [[What You're Proposing]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and Bernie Frost) # [[The Wanderer (Dion song)|The Wanderer]] ([[Ernie Maresca]]) # [[Living on an Island]] ([[Rick Parfitt]] and [[Bob Young]]) # [[Marguerita Time]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and Bernie Frost) # [[In the Army Now (song)|In the Army Now]] ([[Bolland & Bolland|Rob Bolland and Ferdi Bolland]]) # [[When You Walk in the Room]] ([[Jackie DeShannon]]) # [[Ain't Complaining|Burning Bridges]] ([[Francis Rossi]] and [[Andy Bown]]) # [[Fun Fun Fun]] ([[Mike Love]] and [[Brian Wilson]]) # [[Old Time Rock and Roll]] (George Jackson and Thomas E. Jones III) # [[The Anniversary Waltz (Status Quo song)|The Anniversary Walt]] (Lee/Kind/Mack/Mendlesohn/[[Chuck Berry]]/[[Ernie Maresca]]/[[Dave Bartholomew]]/King/[[Albert Collins]]/[[Richard Penniman]]/Hammer/[[Otis Blackwell]]) {{Status Quo}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xs All Areas - The Greatest Hits}} [[Category:2008 greatest hits albums]] [[Category:Status Quo compilation albums]]
